titleStmt.title: The Psalmes of David the king and prophet and of other holy prophets, paraphas'd [sic] in English: conferred with the Hebrew veritie, set forth by B. Arias Montanus, together with the Latine, Greek Septuagint, and Chaldee paraphrase. By R.B.
Bible. O.T. Psalms. English. Brathwait.
titleStmt.author: Brathwaite, Richard, 1588?-1673.
Marshall, William, fl. 1617-1650, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Young, for Francis Constable, and are to be sold at his shop under S. Martins Church neere Ludgate,

notesStmt.note: With an additional title page, engraved, signed by W[illiam]. M[arshall].: The Psalmes of Dauid the Kinge and of other holy prophets, paraphras'd by R.B. Esq[uire]. London printed for Francis Constable. 1638.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
